item.title: Daily Positive Affirmations ❤️ Morning Affirmation Card Pull
item.description: Positive affirmations are a powerful way to create a mindful reset, especially in the midst of life’s challenges. These daily affirmations offer a gentle space for self-love, gratitude, and stress relief, helping you pause, breathe, and realign with your inner peace. Let these uplifting words encourage your personal growth and guide you through some of life’s uncertainties... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/100ba1e80/podcast/rss

item.title: Breaking Ancestral Money Patterns with the Akashic Records with Gretchen Hill Ep:283
item.description: After a near-fatal car crash, Gretchen Hill experienced a spiritual awakening that changed everything—her career, her relationships, and most importantly, her sense of purpose. In this powerful conversation, Gretchen shares how the Akashic Records and ancestral healing helped her—and now her clients—break free from inherited scarcity patterns and step into abundance... Feed: https://feeds.captivate.fm/she-coaches-coaches/
